name: Dexalot
description: The Dexalot Exchange EVM subnet is a revolutionary decentralized exchange aiming at bringing the traditional centralized exchange look and feel, through a decentralized on-chain application. Dexalot users can trade crypto securely and efficiently, with no slippage or custody risk. It is built on Avalanche Subnet technology, the most effective scaling solution in the blockchain industry

chains.description: The Dexalot Exchange EVM subnet is a revolutionary decentralized exchange aiming at bringing the traditional centralized exchange look and feel, through a decentralized on-chain application. Dexalot users can trade crypto securely and efficiently, with no slippage or custody risk. It is built on Avalanche L1 technology, the most effective scaling solution in the blockchain industry.
chains.name: dexalotevm

assets.name: Dexalot
assets.description: Dexalot allows for users to trade ERC20 tokens supported on the C-Chain against the blockchain native currency AVAX or against other supported ERC20 tokens.
